snippet: Kyle Flood said he expected to lead his team in its season opener despite an investigation into whether he improperly communicated with a faculty member about the academic status of a player.
abstract: Rutgers football coach Kyle Flood expects to remain on job despite investigation into alleged misconduct; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Kyle Flood said he expected to lead his team in its season opener despite an investigation into whether he improperly communicated with a faculty member about the academic status of a player.

headline.main: Rutgers Coach Expects to Be on Job
headline.print_headline: Rutgers Coach Expects to Be on Job
